selected_skills.name: extract_ages_from_image
selected_skills.purpose: Extract ages of Alice and Bob from the image.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the image hash to extract the ages of Alice and Bob from the image.

selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: Compute the age gap by subtracting the ages.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.how_to_use: Format the computed age gap as the final answer.
